Riobamba.title: Riobamba
Riobamba.byline: Riobamba is a city in the Andean highlands of Ecuador.

Rio Branco.title: Rio Branco
Rio Branco.byline: Rio Branco is the capital and the biggest city of the state of Acre in Brazil.

Rio de Janeiro.title: Rio de Janeiro
Rio de Janeiro.byline: Rio de Janeiro is the second largest city in Brazil, on the South Atlantic coast.

Rio de Janeiro (state).title: Rio de Janeiro (state)
Rio de Janeiro (state).byline: Rio de Janeiro is a state in the Southeast of Brazil.

Rio de la Plata.title: Rio de la Plata
Rio de la Plata.byline: The part of Uruguay on the Rio de la Plata is much visited for its well-preserved historic sites, pretty colonial towns, and a fair share of beaches and farmland.

Rio Dulce.title: Rio Dulce
Rio Dulce.byline: Rio Dulce Town (also called Fronteras) is a city in eastern Guatemala.

Rio Gallegos.title: Rio Gallegos
Rio Gallegos.byline: Rio Gallegos (Río Gallegos) is a town in southern Argentina.

Rio Grande do Sul.title: Rio Grande do Sul
Rio Grande do Sul.byline: Rio Grande do Sul is the southernmost state in Brazil, bordering Uruguay and Argentina.

Riohacha.title: Riohacha
Riohacha.byline: Riohacha is the capital of the department of La Guajira.

Rioni Region.title: Rioni Region
Rioni Region.byline: Rioni Region is a lush, green, mountainous region in western Georgia along the Rioni River.

Rio San Juan Region.title: Rio San Juan Region
Rio San Juan Region.byline: The Rio San Juan Region is a region in Nicaragua which borders in the south to Plains of the North, Costa Rica

Rio Vista (California).title: Rio Vista (California)
Rio Vista (California).byline: Rio Vista is in the California Delta in Solano County in the Sacramento Valley region of California.

Rio Grande (Rio Grande do Sul).title: Rio Grande (Rio Grande do Sul)
Rio Grande (Rio Grande do Sul).byline: Rio Grande is the oldest city in the Brazilian state of Rio Grande do Sul, the most important port city in the state and has one of the most important maritime ports in Brazil.

Rio Bonito.title: Rio Bonito
Rio Bonito.byline: Rio Bonito is a municipality of the region of Grande Niterói, in the metropolitan area of Rio de Janeiro, in the Rio de Janeiro state.

Rio Grande del Norte National Monument.title: Rio Grande del Norte National Monument
Rio Grande del Norte National Monument.byline: Rio Grande del Norte National Monument is a United States national monument in North Central New Mexico, west of the town of Taos.

Rio Lagartos.title: Rio Lagartos
Rio Lagartos.byline: Río Lagartos is a coastal town in the northeast of Yucatan.
